reviews.title: Great value
reviews.text: I agree completely with the other reviewers of this hotel: new, clean, well-equipped, well-located. Nobody mentioned the interesting parking lot which uses a car elevator: drive the car in, hit "minus 2", elevator descends to underground, door opens, drive out. You can even use rear hotel service elevator to bring your baggage to your car. This hotel is clean, modern and has a nice lobby with a big-screen tv. Breakfast was just so-so and could have been a bit fresher and better attended.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I loved watching the storks in Caceres. Definitely check out the archaeological museum.
reviews.title: Very nice place right in the city center, and sometimes very well priced

likes.liked: — Best location, Brand new hotel, Good deals
likes.disliked: — Regular price might make it expensive
